T.query: SELECT a.addressid,s.stateprovinceid, a.addressline1, a.addressline2, a.city, a.postalcode, s.countryregioncode FROM address AS a JOIN stateprovince AS s ON a.stateprovinceid = s.stateprovinceid WHERE s.countryregioncode NOT IN ('US') AND a.city LIKE 'Pa%' and a.modifieddate > '2008-04-30 00:00:00';
